column1: Bartlett is a city in Shelby County
column4: located northeast of Memphis. The population was 54
column5: 613 at the 2010 U.S. Census. Bartlett is a suburb of the Raleigh community a formerly incorporated town that was a county seat of Shelby County.

column3: first served as the last major Tennesseean depot along the westward stagecoach route from Nashville. It later shifted to serve as a rail station after the stagecoach route was replaced by the Memphis & Ohio Railroad. An agricultural community gradually emerged around the depot and subsequent station that saw little growth until after the American Civil War.The community saw quick growth during Reconstruction
column4: and by 1886 was home to a school
column8: and about 300 inhabitants. It had been officially incorporated on November 1
column10: with a population of less than 100 under the inaugural mayorship of Bryan Wither. The city derived its name from Major Gabriel M. Bartlett
column11: a planter and pioneer settler of the area
column12: whose homeplace was located on the old Raleigh-Somerville Road (Stage Road) at the present location of Bartlett Station Plaza.

column1: Bartlett's public school system was part of the Shelby County Schools until the end of the 2013–2014 school year. On July 16

column1: In 2007 Money magazine listed it as one of the best 100 places to live in the United States. It ranked 95th out of 100.
The John H. McFadden House was listed in the National Register of Historic Places in 1994. It is located at 3712 Broadway.
Davies Manor Plantation is a historic property that includes the oldest log home in Shelby County open to the public
column3: and numerous outbuildings. These outbuildings range from a tenant cabin to a commissary
column4: a gristmill to an outhouse. Additionally
column6: including a kitchen garden and a medicinal herb garden. There are even a walking tour and nature trails available for visitors who love the outdoors.  The website is www.daviesmanorplantation.org

column1: The Nicholas Gotten House is located at 2969 Court Street. It houses the Bartlett Museum
column2: a local history museum operated by the Bartlett Historical Society. The white frame structure was built by Nicholas Gotten in 1871 in the New England saltbox style. A saltbox is a wooden frame house with a long
column3: pitched roof that slopes down to the back.

column1: The Bartlett Recreation Center is a 55
column3: 100 m2) facility that was completed in August 2000.  The recreation center is located at 7700 Flaherty Place directly behind the Bartlett Police Station.  The recreation center is a popular place amongst the people of Bartlett with its swimming pool
column7: and workout rooms.  Since its opening the recreation center has done remarkably well and required no help from the city to remain open.

column1: The Bartlett Performing Arts & Conference Center
column3: was finished in 1999 where it held its first show by Art Garfunkel.  BPACC is located at 3663 Appling Road
column4: directly across the street from the Bartlett Police Station and Appling Middle School.  The facility is not limited to performances but can be rented out for other events such as seminars or business meetings.
